accountSettings.description: Manage your Worldline account API preferences and configurations.

enable.description: With our Pay By Link feature you can send a payment to your customers if they do not complete the payment on Worldline during checkout process or if you wish to create an order for a customer through the shop back-office and then send a payment link to the customer.

disconnect.description: To connect a different Worldline account or disconnect from this store, click the Disconnect button below.

logs.description: Here you can review all sent requests and received responses from Worldline system.

webhooks.description: Here you can review payment webhooks received and their processing status from Worldline system.
